install.name: Chameleon
install.author: http://ninjaforge.com
install.description: Chameleon is a revolutionary new template engine able to camouflage itself into any Joomla! template all by itself.

element.name: type
element.description: Select wether you have a light or dark overall site design.

element.name: border
element.description: Wether you want rounded borders or not.

element.name: separators
element.option: Separators have the same colors as links

element.name: posts_wrap_style
element.description: Wether to use the same styling as forum blocks or no styling beyond the module style. The default is 'Extra', but if you apply good module styling you likely want to set this to 'Standard'.

element.name: style
element.label: Module Style
element.description: Select the module chrome to use for wrapping the blocks

element.name: general_spacing
element.description: The spacing between posts, forums etc

element.name: toolbar_spacing
element.description: The whitespace below or above the toolbar

element.name: change_display_name
element.option: Users can set custom screen names.
Users decide which display name to use but not make a custom one.

element.name: pagination
element.label: Pagination Style
element.description: The custom Ninjaboard pagination style might not work well in all sites and vice versa.

element.name: topic_layout
element.label: Topic Layout
element.description: How you want your topic layout to be like..
element.option: Pagination and toolbar both top and bottom.

element.name: new_topic_button
element.description: Where to see the new topic button.
element.option: Button visible both on forum pages and from a topic.
Button only visible on forum pages.

element.name: lightbox
element.description: The lightbox identifier used in post image uploads rel attribute. It's usually lightbox.
